akn:content.akn:p: § 402g. Elimination of lands The following-described lands are eliminated from the Bryce Canyon National Park and shall hereafter be included in and become a part of the Powell National Forest, subject to all laws and regulations applicable thereto, to wit: Section 30, township 37 south, range 3 west; section 25, unsurveyed township 37 south, range 4 west, Salt Lake meridian. (Feb. 17, 1931, ch. 209, § 2, 46 Stat. 1167.)
